triples.o: two or even three SPECT cameras
triples.evidence: In this setup, there can be two or even three SPECT cameras working at the same time to gather more data.
The CT part of the system gives you precise anatomical information and helps provide accurate attenuation correction for the SPECT data.

triples.o: better quantification, improved image quality, and superior diagnostic capability
triples.evidence: This means better quantification, improved image quality, and superior diagnostic capability through combined anatomical and functional information.
